rules_text: Other creatures you control have base power and toughness equal to this creature’s base power and toughness.
special_text:
Gestalt [i](When this or another creature you control enters, you may merge it with the one in play, keeping counters and attachments. They become the permanent on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Other creatures you control have base power and toughness equal to this creature’s base power and toughness.
